metadata.title: CVE-2012-4446 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: The default configuration for Apache Qpid 0.20 and earlier, when thefederation_tag attribute is enabled, accepts AMQP connections withoutchecking the source user ID, which allows remote attackers to bypassauthentication and have other unspecified impact via an AMQP request.

criterions.comment: qpid-cpp: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
